Package Client.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bullet
    Presents one bullet in the offline game with all its features such as location , speed , time handling and image file .
    CompState
    Handles computer player state by having control of its tank movement (randomly) and updating it through the game .
    GameFrame
    The main frame of the offline game which shows the map , tanks , bullets and other components .
    GameInfo
    Stores the information of a game such as mode , tank lives , bullet power and other important settings .
    GameLoop
    A very simple structure for the main game loop.
    GameState
    State of the offline game consisting of the user state and computer state .
    Tank
    Simulation of tank in the game consisting of all of its components such as location , bullets , moveThread and speed .
    ThreadPool
    This class holds a global thread-pool for executing our threads.
    UserState
    State of the user in offline game which stores the data of the user such as its tank and handles its keyListener class .
